title: Efficacy and safety of aerosol inhalation of vMIP in the treatment of novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19): a single arm clinical trial
Clinical study for community based prevention and control strategy of novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19) in the isolate suspected and confirmed population
Community based prevention and control for Chinese medicine in the treatment of novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19) in the isolate suspected and confirmed population
A single-arm, single-center clinical trial for Azivudine tablets in the treatment of adult novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19)
Study for evaluation of integrated traditional Chinese and Western Medicine in the treatment of Novel Coronavirus Pneumonia (COVID-19)
treatment of COVID-19 whit vitamin A

title: Effect of COVID 19 survivors plasma in COVID 19 patients with ARDS
comments: Not exact about standard of care. Can receive therapies such as antibiotics, corticosteroids and HCQ. Call undefined.

title: A Phase 1/2 randomized, placebo-controlled, multi-centre study to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of COVID-19 Vaccine in Healthy Adults
comments: Trial has 2 parts with different combinations and doses of vaccine and placebo. Simplifying to 2 different vaccine dose arms (for the 2 different amounts of shots) and a placebo arm (this is basically what Phase 1 looked like) as we can't really easily differentiate shot + shot vs. shot + placebo (both at different doses) vs. just placebo well in our schema.

title: Study for prevention of novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19) in high risk population by Chinese medicine
comments: Unclear from registration whether spray is also a traditional medicine.

title: Effectiveness and safety of plasma convalescent therapy in patients with COVID-19
Evaluation of the effect of ghamz with needle on improvement of respiratory symptoms of COVID-19 patients admitted to hospital
Trial Evaluating Efficacy and Safety of Anticoagulation in Patients With COVID-19 Infection, Nested in the Corimmuno-19 Cohort
comments: They list a number of anticoagulants people could get preventatively in the control arm so we've grouped them into the general anticoagulants category.

title: Treatment for COVID-19 in High-Risk Adult Outpatients
comments: Combined the placebo arms into 1 placebo arm for our purposes.

title: Administration of Intravenous Vitamin C in Novel Coronavirus Infection (COVID-19) and Decreased Oxygenation
comments: Both arms get vitamin C so collapsed into single unique arm.

title: Lung Recruitment Device for COVID-19
comments: Interventions are the same in both arms, just the order of the 2 procedures is different. Making 2 different arms to reflect this as I think it's basically analogous to different dosing.

title: PROne Positioning in coVID-19 Oxygeno-dependent Patients in Spontaneous Ventilation (PROVID Study)
Safety and Efficacy of Therapeutic Anticoagulation on Clinical Outcomes in Hospitalized Patients With COVID-19
comments: The registration is unclear about what the "standard of care" anticoagulation group means so chose generic anticoagulation.

title: Potential Role of Gum Arabic as Immunomodulatory Agent Among COVID 19 Patients
Hypertonic Saline Nasal Irrigation and Gargling in Suspected or Confirmed COVID-19 (ELVIS COVID-19)
Inhaled Ibuprofen to Treat COVID-19
TOFAcitinib Plus Hydroxycloroquine vs Hydroxycloroquine in Patients With COVID-19 Interstitial Pneumonia
Low Dose Radiotherapy in COVID-19 Pneumonia
comments: All the patients will also receive the standard national protocol of COVID-19 management.

title: Using PRP and Cord Blood in Treatment of Covid -19
comments: Assuming here LGF is some shorthand for stem cells.

title: P2Et Extract in the Symptomatic Treatment of Subjects With COVID-19
Primary Prevention of Infection by COVID-19 in Health Providers
comments: Calling multiple categories as spray sounds like a drug and a food emulsion like a dietary supplement.

title: QuadraMune(TM) for Prevention of COVID-19
comments: The natural ingredients of QuadraMune are Pterostilbene, Epigallocatechin gallate (EGCG), Sulforaphane, and Thymoquinone.

title: Dornase Alpha for the Treatment of COVID-19
comments: Looks like they gave dornase alpha to 2 populations and then had controls for both. Control is unspecfied. Collapsing into 1 DA arm and 1 control arm.

title: An Open Study of the Safety, Tolerability and Immunogenicity of the Drug 'Gam-COVID-Vac' Vaccine Against COVID-19
comments: Three arms each with a different version or combination of the vaccine.

title: Convalescent Plasma Therapy on Critically-ill Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) Patients
Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy of Food Supplement ManremycÂ® Against SARS- COV-2 Infection (COVID-19) in Healthcare Workers

comments: Based on other similar trials, preventative antocoag becomes a defined SoC as a control while active or therapeutic is the experimental.

title: the Investigation Into Beneficial Effects of High-dose Interferon Beta 1-a, Compared to Low-dose Interferon Beta 1-a in Moderate to Severe Covid-19
An Open Non-comparative Study of the Efficacy and Safety of Aprotinin in Patients Hospitalized With COVID-19
comments: Study in 2 phases, using 2nd phase for extraction.

title: Nasal Irrigation to Reduce COVID-19 Morbidity

comments: The control is just other ways of positioning.

title: Clinical study on Dabur Chyawanprash as a preventive remedy in pandemic of Covid-19.
Effectiveness of Siddha medicine, Kabasura kudineer and vitamin c-zinc supplementation in the management of Mild COVID 19 patients.
Evaluation of safety and efficacy of T-AYU-HM Premium and Onion steam vaporization/nebulization in Covid-19 patients.
Anticoagulation in Critically Ill Patients With COVID-19 (The IMPACT Trial)
comments: In each arm the participant could have received one of many anticoagulants so I've listed that as general anticoagulation.

title: A Clinical Study to Assess the Natural History of COVID-19 and Effects of KB109 and Supportive Self-care in Outpatients With Mild-to-moderate COVID-19
comments: What they call self supportive care is not defined.

title: Dexamethasone and Oxygen Support Strategies in ICU Patients With Covid-19 Pneumonia
comments: The primary analysis is Dex vs. placebo so ignoring the ventilation arms for our purposes. See quote below:\n\nThe main objective is to assess the impact of dexamethasone on overall mortality at day-60 after randomization in patients admitted in ICU for severe COVID-19 infection.

title: Timing of Corticosteroids in COVID-19
comments: While the control also gets a coritcosteroid, they get it late. The intervention being tested is early treatment so not getting the early treatment is like getting no treatment here.

title: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Remdesivir Plus Tocilizumab Compared With Remdesivir Plus Placebo in Hospitalized Participants With Severe COVID-19 Pneumonia
Elmo Respiratory Support Project - COVID-19
comments: Looks like this is actually a single arm trial of this ELMO system.

title: A Study on the Safety, Tolerability and Immune Response of SARS-CoV-2 Sclamp (COVID-19) Vaccine in Healthy Adults
comments: Each arm is a different dose.

title: Salivary SARS-CoV-2 Load of Covid-19 Patients After Oral Antimicrobial Solutions and Dentifrices
comments: There were also a toothpaste part of this trial. Collapsed that into 1 arm.

title: A study to assess several different treatments that may be useful for patients with COVID-19
comments: Trial is made up of multiple sub-trials. Captured all interventions used as unique arms.

title: Preventing COVID-19 Complications With Low- and High-dose Anticoagulation
comments: Per other trials like this, prophylactic dose as SoC, high as experimental

title: Randomized Proof-of-Concept Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Explore the Effectiveness of Resveratrol, a Plant Polyphenol, for COVID-19
comments: Vitamin D is listed as placebo, but was coded as standard of care as it was given to the experimental group as well.

title: A low-intervention study of pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) in healthy volunteers at high risk of coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) infection.
DALIA Study
Effects of Discontinuing Renin-angiotensin System Inhibitors in Patients With and Without COVID-19
comments: This is a study of continuation/discontinuation of ACE/ARBs. It's slightly more complex than this but I'm putting it in as an ACE/ARB arms and a no treatment control arm which is fine for our purposes.

title: Adaptive COVID-19 Treatment Trial 2 (ACTT-2)
Effects of different VTE prevention methods on the prognosis of hospitalized patients with novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19)
comments: mechanical preventive anticoagulation seems to mean things like compression. Calling this a procedure.

title: Evaluation of the Safety and Immunogenicity of a SARS-CoV-2 rS Nanoparticle Vaccine With/Without Matrix-M Adjuvant
comments: Phase 1/2, using Phase 2. 6 different dosing arms and a placebo arm.

title: Efficacy of a Nasal Spray Containing Iota-Carrageenan in the Prophylaxis of COVID-19 Disease in Health Personnel Dedicated to Patients Care With COVID-19 Disease
The Effect of Aerobic Exercise on Immune Biomarkers and Symptoms Severity and Progression in Patients With COVID-19: A Pilot Randomized Control Trial
Will Hydroxychloroquine Impede or Prevent COVID-19
comments: Other is a Non-Randomized Active Comparator arm of HCWs already on HCQ so not getting it as part of the study.

title: Inhalation of KELEA Excellerated Water in Covid-19 Infected Individuals
comments: Not 100% sure what KELEA Excellerated Water is so I've listed it as "Other". this is technically a cross-over trial (both arms get placebo and intervention in different order) in how it is described so I'm making it a treatment and a placebo arm.

title: The Clinical Study of Carrimycin on Treatment Patients With COVID-19
Chemoprophylaxis of SARS-CoV-2 Infection (COVID-19) in Exposed Healthcare Workers
comments: both arms consist of two arms: Hydroxychloroquine vs. Placebo, Lopinavir/ritonavir vs. Placebo (two placeboarms were coded as one arm \nno comparison/no randomization between hydroxychloroquine and lopinavir/ritonavir arms

title: Efficacy and Safety of High-dose Vitamin C Combined With Chinese Medicine Against Coronavirus Pneumonia (COVID-19)
comments: There was also kind of a placebo element here because there was a glucose infusion without vitamin C in some arms (collapsed arms for severe/moderate covid) but this is tough to show in our schema.

title: Safety & Efficacy of Low Dose Aspirin / Ivermectin Combination Therapy for Treatment of Covid-19 Patients
Comparison of Tocilizumab Plus Dexamethasone vs. Dexamethasone for Patients With Covid-19
Effect of convalescent plasma therapy on intensive care unit (ICU) deaths from COVID-19 in Suriname
comments: it was dexamethason vs. convalescent plasma, dexamethason is described as standard of care; both groups received supportive therapy such as additional respiratory and circulatory support.

title: ANTIBODY-LEVEL BASED ANALYSIS OF COVID-19 CONVALESCENT SERUM (ABACCuS)
comments: Two different arms based on type of patient. Collapsed into 1 unique arm for our purposes.

title: Adaptive COVID-19 Treatment Trial 4 (ACTT-4)
comments: Each arm technically also got a placebo of the other arm (so barcitinib arm got a dex placebo and visa versa) but we don't have a way to put placebo into the experimental arm in our schema.

title: A Real World Study of Bamlanivimab in Participants With Mild-to-moderate Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19)
comments: Originally had a matched control arm but registration says this is now removed.

title: A randomized, parallel controlled trial for the efficacy and safety of Sodium Aescinate Injection in the treatment of patients with pneumonia (COVID-19)
comments: Simplifying to control arm, glucocorticoids (hormomonal therapy) and Sodium Aescinate arm

title: A prospective, multicenter, open-label, randomized, parallel-controlled trial for probiotics to evaluate efficacy and safety in patients infected with 2019 novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19)

A multicenter, randomized, open, controlled clinical study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of recombinant cytokine gene-derived protein injection in combination with standard therapy in patients with novel coronavirus infection
Efficacy of Chinese Herbal Tea in the Prevention of Novel Coronavirus Pneumonia (COVID-19): a Randomized Controlled Trial
Boosting the BCG-induced immunity response by addition of bisphosphonate or MMR vaccine: a possible preventive approach against the coronavirus (BCG-PLUS)
comments: Registration isn't very clear about what the exact arms are. Says there are 5 arms but I can really only confidently id 3. Placebo, BCG+MMR and BCG+Alendronic Acid

title: The Efficacy and Safety of Thalidomide Combined With Low-dose Hormones in the Treatment of Severe COVID-19
Evaluation of the Efficacy and Safety of Sarilumab in Hospitalized Patients With COVID-19
comments: Different cohorts and arms but basically Sarilumab vs placebo

title: Hydroxychloroquine Plus Azithromycin Versus Hydroxychloroquine for COVID-19 Pneumonia (COVIDOC Trial)
Efficacy and Safety of MTX-loaded Nanoparticles to Treat Severe COVID-19 Patients
PROLIFIC ChemoprophylaxisTrial (COVID-19)
Proactive Care of Ambulatory COVID19 Patients
Photodynamic Therapy for the Treatment of COVID-19
An Adaptive Study of Favipiravir Compared to Standard of Care in Hospitalized Patients With COVID-19
comments: No specific about what standard of care is even though they list some therapies. It many include those. Using the "Pivotal" stage for extraction which is the selected pilot dose of favipiravir vs SoC.

title: Assessment of the Effectiveness of Vibroacoustic Therapy for Respiratory Failure Caused by COVID 19
comments: This trial did not register its arms correctly and therefore there is no good data on what the arms of the trial are. I am only recording the VibroLung arm as that's the only one I can be sure existed.

title: Safety and Efficacy of PHR 160 Spray on the Outcomes of Patients With COVID-19
comments: PHR spray is a traditional Iranian medicine.

title: Low-dose Tocilizumab Versus Standard of Care in Hospitalized Patients With COVID-19
comments: Contains two sub-studies. Basically Toc (at 2 doses) vs SoC and High-dose Toc vs 2 Low-doses of Toc. I'm representing this as 3 unique doses of Toc overall (40, 120, 400) and a soc arm.

title: Virucidal Effect of Povidone Iodine on COVID-19 In-Vivo
comments: Various concentrations (6 overall, 4 uniqu) and delivery methods of povidone iodine. For our purposes fine to collapse into 2 PI arms (for the 2 types of delivery as the main distinguishing factor) and then the placebo control.

title: Efficacy and Safety of a Highly Selective Semipermeable Membrane (AN-69 Oxiris) vs (Standard AN-69) in COVID-19
Research study to evaluate the impact of Selected Ayurvedic interventions in containment zone
comments: The comparator is "Hand sanitizer Face Mask Social Distancing" which is basic control methods. Listing as "no treatment" as the control.

title: Protect: Study With Hydroxychloroquine for Prevention and Early Phase Treatment of Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19)
comments: Effectively 2 different dosing schedules of HCQ (for 2 different types of patient) compared to no treatment (observation).

title: Hypertonic Saline for COVID-19 Symptoms
Reducing acute severe respiratory events in health care workers during the Covid-19 pandemic with OM85
comments: Wait list control basically means people who didn't get treatment.

title: A Clinical Trial to Determine the Safety and Efficacy of Hope Biosciences Autologous Mesenchymal Stem Cell Therapy (HB-adMSCs) to Provide Protection Against COVID-19
Chloroquine Diphosphate for the Treatment of Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Secondary to SARS-CoV2 (CloroCOVID19)
comments: Taking the stage 2 study (CQ vs placebo) for extraction.

title: CIGB-258 at COVID-19
Umifenovir in Hospitalized COVID-19 Patients
TD-0903 for ALI Associated With COVID-19
comments: Extracted Part 2: Drug vs. Placebo. Part 1 about figuring out dosing w/ multiple arms.

title: Prolectin-M in COVID-19 Patients Having Mild to Moderate Symptoms Not Requiring Oxygen Support.
comments: Defaulted this to a drug as unclear if it is a drug or biologic.

title: Personal Protective Equipment for the Prevention of SARS-Cov-2 During Neonatal Resuscitation
Pragmatic clinical trial of hydroxychloroquine in the treatment of oncohematological patients and health professionals with COVID-19 infection without radiological alteration.
comments: Two different cohorts based on disease both all just get HCQ as only unique arm.

title: Natural Killer Cell (CYNK-001) Infusions in Adults With COVID-19
The PATCH Trial (Prevention And Treatment of COVID-19 With Hydroxychloroquine)
comments: Three different cohorts in this study: HCQ vs placebo in two and High-dose HCQ vs low-dose HCQ in one all in different populations. Putting in as HCQ arm and placebo arm as most representative of what this study was examining and indicative of the arms.

title: Antithrombotic Therapy to Ameliorate Complications of COVID-19 (ATTACC)
comments: They get either type of heparin therapeutically in the experimental group.

title: Study for continuous renal replacement therapy with adsorption filter in the treatment of the novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19)
Using GM-CSF as a Host Directed Therapeutic Against COVID-19

comments: Vitamin B was the placebo it looks like. Not a SoC.

title: Full Dose Heparin Vs. Prophylactic Or Intermediate Dose Heparin in High Risk COVID-19 Patients
comments: SoC is prophylactic doses of either heparin.

title: Stopping ACE-inhibitors in COVID-19

title: Clinical Trial on the Efficacy and Safety of Bemiparin in Patients Hospitalized Because of COVID-19

title: Covid-19 Associated Coagulopathy

title: Weight-Adjusted vs Fixed Low Doses of Low Molecular Weight Heparin For Venous Thromboembolism Prevention in COVID-19

title: Sleep position related to hospital length of stay in admitted COVID-19 patients
Influence of Prior Infection With COVID-19 on Occurrence of Influenza-like Illness or Acute Respiratory Infection

comments: Disregarding pilot. Extracted the Phase 2 study.

title: COVID-19 Watch + COVID-19 Pulse
Comparison of Two Different Doses of Bemiparin in COVID-19
comments: Two different doses, experimental and soc.

title: Enoxaparin at Prophylactic or Therapeutic Doses in COVID-19
comments: SoC is Enoxaparin at another dose

title: Clinical Trial of Efficacy and Safety of Sinovac's Adsorbed COVID-19 (Inactivated) Vaccine in Healthcare Professionals
comments: Arms are also separated by age, not relevant for us.

title: (CBDRA60) to Prevent or Reduce Symptoms of COVID-19 and Prevention of Post-Acute Sequelae of SARS-CoV-2 Infection PASC
comments: Calling this a drug but I think an argument could be made for a traditional medicine. Registry call is a dietary supplement but we don't use that definition in that context.

Clinical Decision Support System Based on Non-invasive Tele-monitoring of COVID-19 Patients

comments: I think this study should maybe be excluded.

title: Impact of GSE and Xylitol (Xlear) on COVID-19 Symptoms and Time to PCR Negativisation in COVID-19 Patients
comments: Not really drugs, not dietary supplements, not traditional medicine so put as other

comments: Three arms here, double-checked with article https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC8080510/

comments: Two different types of plasma arms collapsed into 1 here

Pulmozyme to Improve COVID-19 ARDS Outcomes

comments: Combined the two Homeostat + Paracetamol arms

title: Safety, Tolerability and Immunogenicinity of a Coronavirus-Like Particle COVID-19 Vaccine in Adults Aged 18-55 Years.

comments: Extracted the Phase 3 part of the trial

comments: Just different spacings of doses. Collapsed into 1 arm.

comments: This trial is a bit confusing and shifted over time. Basically I am calling the SOC control herparin at a prophylactic dose. Then there was a high dose heparin arm (so just more heparin plus SoC) then high dose + P2Y12 inhibitor, SOC + P2Y12 inhibitor, prophylactic dose + Crizanlizumab, and prophylactic dose + SGLT2 inhibitor
